Q2: Problem Statement:
======================
- Your task is to create a large integer library, similar to what we have in Java as BigInteger.
- Your library should provide functionalities to store arbitrarily large integer and perform basic
  math operations.
- Operations to be implemented: Fast exponentiation, GCD of 2 integers and factorial
